question: Who hails Real-time Governance module of ChandraBabu Naidu?
explanation: Veteran Business leader Kiran Mazumdar Shaw urged political class to emulate the good governance module for better transparency and accountability. The Chairman and Managing Director of Biocon took to Twitter and shared a snap from the cabinet meeting under the Chairmanship of Chandra Babu Naidu. Recently, President Ram Nath Kovind also took the stock of the war room developed by state administration during his state visit and also hailed the unique initiative. The main aim of RTG tool is to strengthen the course of administration and governance using technological intervention like e-governance, new age technology, and electronic communication.
